DOC.brief_summary: This research study test SABER™-Bupivacaine ( experimental pain-relieving medication ) . SABER™-Bupivacaine design continuously deliver bupivacaine , common local anesthetic , day order treat local post-surgical pain . This study test SABER™-Bupivacaine people surgery repair hernia . The purpose study measure compare safety ( side effect ) , tolerability ( ability tolerate ) , efficacy ( well work ) two different volume SABER™-Bupivacaine SABER™-Placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study SABER™-Bupivacaine Pain Following Hernia Repair
